name: Pocket Alchemist
description:
This game is still in development.

I am excited to say this is my first official game jam submission! I worked on this for 4 days of the 18 day jam, it's playable but I have many more things to add before it is completely finished. There is currently no end game, consider it beat when you have found the Eternal flower.

You are an alchemist on the search for the single flower of eternal life. Many obstacles stand in your way but you will prevail! Collect ingredients and carefully decide what herbs to plant and what herbs to use in potions. currently there are two recipes you can cook. recipes require 3 or 4 ingredients. You can interact with any object that has color.

Warning: Potions WILL fail

Controls:

WASD: movement ; E: pickup item/craft potion

I: Inventory/cook while on cooking pad ; QWAS: inventory slot selection

ctrl: while inventory is open, switches to seed extraction mode

Post Jam version:

does not yet have an end game
